data.system_settings: Windows 10 Home SL Fall Creators Update
data.actual_result: You will receive a notification message from a user that has nothing.
data.expected_result: Clyde will reply you with a message saying the message could not deliver because of... or you will not receiving any messages from the user.
data.short_description: sending an invite/message to a user notifies you that you received a messaged with nothing while server member DM is turned off
data.steps_to_repro: Prerequisite: Make sure that you don't share a server, have the user blocked or as a friend, and close your server DM's via privacy settings.- Open the context menu from the user (could do an user who has left the server.)- Click on Invite to Server- Choose a random server.
